title: Introduction to Web Development
description: Learn the basics of web development, including HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

modules.title: HTML Basics
modules.description: Understanding the structure of web pages.

contents.title: Introduction to HTML
contents.content: HTML is the standard markup language for creating web pages.

contents.title: HTML Tutorial
contents.content: This video covers the basics of HTML.

modules.title: CSS Fundamentals
modules.description: Styling web pages with CSS.

contents.title: Introduction to CSS
contents.content: CSS stands for Cascading Style Sheets.

contents.title: CSS Crash Course
contents.content: A quick crash course on CSS.

reviews.comment: This course was amazing! I learned so much.
Great content, but I wish there were more exercises.

modules.title: ES6 Features

reviews.comment: A comprehensive course that covers everything!

queries.content: Is this course suitable for beginners?

title: IELTS Preparation Course
description: A comprehensive course designed to help students prepare for the IELTS exam, covering all four skills: Listening, Reading, Writing, and Speaking.

modules.title: Listening Skills
modules.description: Enhance your listening skills for the IELTS exam.

contents.title: Understanding IELTS Listening
contents.content: This video covers the IELTS listening test format and strategies.

contents.title: Listening Tips
contents.content: Learn useful tips for improving your listening skills.

contents.assignment: Complete the listening exercises provided in the course materials.
contents.title: Listening Practice
contents.content: Practice listening to various accents and types of questions.

modules.title: Reading Skills
modules.description: Develop your reading skills to excel in the IELTS reading section.

contents.title: Understanding IELTS Reading
contents.content: This video explains the reading test format and types of questions.

contents.title: Reading Strategies
contents.content: Learn effective strategies for answering reading comprehension questions.

contents.title: Reading Practice
contents.content: Practice skimming and scanning techniques.

modules.title: Writing Skills
modules.description: Master the writing tasks in the IELTS exam.

contents.title: IELTS Writing Task 1
contents.content: Learn how to approach the IELTS Writing Task 1.

contents.title: Writing Task 2 Guide
contents.content: A comprehensive guide to writing essays for Task 2.

contents.assignment: Write an essay based on the provided prompt.
contents.title: Writing Practice
contents.content: Focus on structure, coherence, and vocabulary.

modules.title: Speaking Skills
modules.description: Practice your speaking skills for the IELTS speaking test.

contents.title: IELTS Speaking Test Format
contents.content: An overview of the speaking test format and scoring.

contents.title: Speaking Strategies
contents.content: Tips for answering common speaking test questions.

contents.assignment: Record a mock speaking test with a partner.
contents.title: Speaking Practice
contents.content: Focus on fluency, pronunciation, and coherence.

reviews.comment: This course was extremely helpful for my IELTS preparation! Highly recommend.
Good content, but I wish there were more practice exercises.

queries.content: Is there a refund policy for this course?
queries.replay: Yes, we offer a 30-day money-back guarantee if you're not satisfied with the course.

queries.content: Will there be live sessions included?
queries.replay: Yes, we will have live Q&A sessions every month.

title: Web Development Bootcamp
description: Master full-stack web development with HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and back-end technologies like Node.js, Express, and MongoDB.

modules.title: Introduction to Web Development
modules.description: Learn the basics of web development and tools you need to get started.

contents.title: Welcome to the Course
contents.content: An introduction to the course and how to navigate it.

contents.title: What is Web Development?
contents.content: Web development is the work involved in developing a website for the Internet.

modules.title: Front-End Basics
modules.description: Dive into HTML, CSS, and JavaScript basics.

contents.title: HTML Basics
contents.content: Learn the structure of web pages with HTML.

contents.title: CSS Basics
contents.content: Style your web pages with CSS.

contents.title: JavaScript Basics
contents.content: Add interactivity to web pages with JavaScript.

modules.title: Back-End Development

modules.description: Build a full-stack web application with all the technologies you've learned.

contents.content: Learn how to set up your full-stack project.

contents.title: Deploying Your Web App
contents.content: Deploy your full-stack application to the cloud.

contents.title: Collaborating with GitHub

reviews.comment: Great course! The instructors explain concepts clearly.
Very informative, but could use more advanced topics.

queries.content: Will there be an advanced course after this?
queries.replay: Yes, we are planning to release an advanced version soon!

title: Advanced JavaScript and React.js Mastery
description: Deep dive into advanced JavaScript concepts and become a React.js expert, learning hooks, state management, and more.

contents.content: Learn how to manage state and side effects with React hooks.

contents.title: Creating Custom Hooks
contents.content: Understand how to create and reuse custom hooks in your React app.

modules.title: State Management with Redux

contents.title: Introduction to Redux
contents.content: Get started with Redux for global state management.

contents.title: Using Redux in a React Application
contents.content: Learn how to integrate Redux into your React application.

modules.title: Building a Full React Application

contents.title: Project Setup and Folder Structure
contents.content: Learn how to set up a React project and organize your code.

contents.title: Building Components and Adding Functionality
contents.content: Build components and add interactivity to your React app.

reviews.comment: Amazing course! The React section is very comprehensive.
Great content, but could include more real-world projects.

queries.content: Will there be a section on React Native?

queries.replay: Yes, we are planning to add a React Native module soon!

title: Complete React Native Mobile App Development Masterclass
description: Master React Native and build cross-platform mobile applications for iOS and Android from scratch. Learn how to design, develop, and deploy apps with React Native, Expo, and other key tools.

modules.title: Introduction to React Native
modules.description: Get started with React Native, learn its core features and understand its relevance in mobile development.

contents.title: What is React Native?
contents.content: An introduction to React Native and how it powers cross-platform mobile apps.

contents.title: Why Choose React Native?
contents.content: A comparison of React Native with other frameworks like Flutter and native development.

modules.title: Setting Up the Development Environment
modules.description: Learn to set up your development environment for React Native with Expo and CLI.

contents.title: Installing Expo CLI
contents.content: A guide to installing and configuring Expo CLI for React Native development.

contents.title: Setting Up Emulator for Android & iOS
contents.content: Learn how to set up an Android and iOS emulator for development.

modules.title: React Native Components and Styling
modules.description: Understand React Native components and learn how to style your apps effectively.

contents.title: Building UI with React Native Components
contents.content: Learn about core components like View, Text, and Image, and how to build UIs.

contents.title: Styling in React Native
contents.content: Learn to style your app using StyleSheet, Flexbox, and other styling techniques.

modules.title: Navigation and State Management
modules.description: Learn to add navigation between screens and manage state using React Native.

contents.title: React Navigation Setup
contents.content: Learn how to set up React Navigation and navigate between different screens.

contents.title: State Management with Redux
contents.content: Introduction to Redux for managing state in React Native apps.

modules.title: Working with APIs and Data
modules.description: Learn to fetch data from APIs and display it in your mobile app.

contents.title: Fetching Data from APIs
contents.content: Learn how to fetch and display data from REST APIs using Axios or Fetch.

contents.title: Handling Asynchronous Operations
contents.content: Understand how to handle asynchronous calls in React Native apps.

modules.title: Device Features and Permissions
modules.description: Learn how to access device features like camera, GPS, and handle app permissions.

contents.title: Using the Camera and Media Library
contents.content: Learn how to integrate the camera and media library into your app.

contents.title: Handling Permissions in React Native
contents.content: Understand how to request and manage app permissions.

modules.title: Deploying Apps to Play Store and App Store
modules.description: Learn to build and deploy your React Native app on Google Play and the Apple App Store.

contents.title: Deploying to Google Play Store
contents.content: A step-by-step guide to deploying your app on the Play Store.

contents.title: Deploying to Apple App Store
contents.content: Learn how to build, test, and deploy your app on the Apple App Store.

reviews.comment: Excellent course for anyone looking to get into mobile development with React Native!
Good content, but I wish there were more real-world projects.

queries.content: Does this course cover TypeScript with React Native?
queries.replay: Yes, TypeScript integration will be introduced in a future update!
